chunk:
Skin Inc. Vitamin B3+ Serum Rescue (2018 formulation)

Brand: Skin Inc.

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Panthenol, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Carbomer, Potassium Hydroxide, Glucosyl Hesperidin, Alcaligenes Polysaccharides,

nes Polysaccharides, Algin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Polysorbate 80, Caramel, Phenoxyethanol

Directions: Apply 3 drops twice daily after cleansing before applying moisturizer.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
